## Collections.IReadOnlyConvertingCollector interface

A read-only interface exposing non-mutating methods of a [ConvertingCollector](./ts-utils.collections.iconvertingcollector.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

export interface IReadOnlyConvertingCollector<TKEY extends string = string, TINDEX extends number = number, TITEM extends ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX> = ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX>> extends IReadOnlyResultMap<TKEY, TITEM>
